name: DanceJukebox
description:
Enter the space-lounge where the animated cartoon "Lisa" is dancing.

You choose which dance Lisa should perform. So you can use this experience to learn some cool new dance moves or if you just want to enjoy watching some great entertainment.

The project-team consisted of Mats Franzen, Eda Celebi and Tina Urdahl. The cartoon character is designed by cartoonist Asa Holmqvist (www.seriasa.se)

The project have used the following assets from Sketchfab:

"Pretty simple discoball" (https://skfb.ly/6UYsx) by pan.stasian is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

"Champagne Bottle" (https://skfb.ly/6RZNt) by SalrunMacaod is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/).

"Popcorn bucket" (https://skfb.ly/6UCTz) by Broccoletto is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
